DOC.brief_summary: - Muscle cramps markedly affect the quality of life in cirrhotic patients with no highly effective drug. - Quinine was suggested for treatment of patients with muscle cramps in patients with liver cirrhosis. However, thrombocytopenia, cardiac arrhythmias and cinchonism are serious side effects.
DOC.brief_title: Gabapentin in Treatment of Muscle Cramps in Patients With Liver Cirrhosis
